Para valores entre -1000 e 1000 temos:

Array desorganizado, formado por número pseudo-aleatórios:
[890.4565019844451, 141.20900797046465, 889.0649768249928, -76.99851946252045, 818.6704392453496, -826.284059092373, 335.5342838659169, 946.6574345014694, -875.4608986999908, 552.9779817628073, 362.5254112345897, -120.40306791208843, 404.2028888362747, -421.80392205603766, -648.0928663349516, -344.50140250000527, -996.1327964887705, -649.4569413095668, 241.52834051645323, -410.96903087771545]

Array organizado:
[-996.1327964887705, -875.4608986999908, -826.284059092373, -649.4569413095668, -648.0928663349516, -421.80392205603766, -410.96903087771545, -344.50140250000527, -120.40306791208843, -76.99851946252045, 141.20900797046465, 241.52834051645323, 335.5342838659169, 362.5254112345897, 404.2028888362747, 552.9779817628073, 818.6704392453496, 889.0649768249928, 890.4565019844451, 946.6574345014694]
